about_the_game:
Montana Smith is a grid-based puzzle-adventure set in lush jungles full of ancient temples. Climb and jump to explore the ruins. Solve puzzles and decipher riddles of a forgotten civilization. Keep an eye out for deadly traps and hidden artifacts.

  • Novel Grid-based Movement - it is a first-person grid-based game like old-school dungeon crawlers but with a twist. You can climb walls, jump over gaps and interact with the environment to forge new paths. It is unlike the other dungeon crawlers and FPS puzzlers you played.



  • Curiosity-driven Exploration - always be on the lookout for hidden treasures. Maybe you just caught a glimpse of gold on a higher platform, maybe a weird construction stands by the side of the road, or some vines growing on the side of the ravine. Investigate and your curiosity will be rewarded.



  • Hand-crafted Puzzles - The game will offer a variety of clever puzzles and riddles for you to solve. From spacial wayfinding challenges and logical puzzles to cryptic inventory-based riddles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Montana Smith is a first-person grid-based puzzler. Explore the forsaken ruins, climb the crumbling walls, jump over the chasms. Avoid the deadly traps and solve puzzles to discover the forgotten treasures.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
